hero.title: Find your flow
hero.subtitle: Boutique classes designed to challenge, inspire, and transform. From HIIT to barre to yoga sculpt, discover workouts that make you excited to move. Premium equipment, expert instructors, and a community that celebrates every win.
hero.imageAlt: Modern boutique fitness studio with natural light

about.title: Welcome to FLOW
about.subtitle: Where fitness meets community
about.content: FLOW is your neighborhood boutique studio offering 30+ classes weekly in a beautiful, uplifting space. We blend the best of barre, HIIT, yoga, and strength training with killer playlists and instructors who genuinely care about your goals.

products.name: Flow HIIT
products.description: 45-min high-intensity intervals with weights, cardio bursts, and core work. Burn calories and build strength.

products.name: Barre Sculpt
products.description: Ballet-inspired class using light weights and high reps to sculpt long, lean muscles. Low-impact, high results.

products.name: Power Yoga
products.description: Vinyasa flow with strength-building poses. Build flexibility, balance, and mindfulness.

products.name: Cycle & Sculpt
products.description: 30 min on our rhythm-based bikes followed by 20 min of upper body sculpting. The ultimate combo.

products.name: Stretch & Restore
products.description: Deep stretching, foam rolling, and breath work for recovery. Perfect complement to intense workouts.

products.name: Unlimited Monthly
products.description: Unlimited classes all month. Best value for dedicated members. Includes guest passes.

services.title: Class Offerings
services.subtitle: 30+ classes weekly for every body and goal

items.text: I've tried every boutique studio in town and FLOW is hands-down the best. The instructors are incredible and I actually look forward to working out!
items.author: Emma Wilson
items.title: Unlimited Member

items.text: The barre classes completely transformed my body. I'm stronger and more toned than I've ever been. Plus the community is so supportive!
items.author: Sophia Lee
items.title: 6-Month Member

items.text: FLOW made me fall in love with fitness again. The variety keeps it exciting and the instructors push me just the right amount.
items.author: Rachel Martinez
items.title: Founding Member

members.name: Jordan Blake
members.title: Founder & Lead Instructor
members.bio: Former dancer turned fitness entrepreneur. Certified in HIIT, barre, and yoga with a passion for creating workouts that challenge and uplift.
